definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: suffer injury (Targum id.; As. nazâḳu, injure; on combin. with Ar. nqs. impair, v. Ba:ES 51 Frä:BAS iii. 81);—

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: injure: Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּהַנְזִ֑ק]] (K:§ 33, 2) Ezr 4:13 (acc. pers.). Pt. act. f. cstr. [[מְהַנְזְקַת מַלְכְין]] v:Ezr 4:15; Inf. cstr. ´[[לְהַנְזׇתַ מ]]: v:Ezr 4:22 (K:ib. d); M:§ 48 c [[קֻת]]-).
